description:
Yoshino used to live a normal high school life, but after his friend http://anidb.net/ch46799 [Mahiro] gets him involved, he decides to help them save the world. He`s able to asses matters calmly, which helps him keep Mahiro from acting recklessly. He used to date Mahiro`s departed sister, but they kept that a secret from him.
Source: ANN
name: Takigawa Yoshino
